parameter.name: bmz_id
parameter.label: BMZ Id
parameter.description: Set the BMZ ID that references the ID in the PureClarity Admin.

parameter.name: bmz_fallback_cms_block
parameter.label: Fallback Block Id
parameter.description: You can set an alternative Block to be displayed should a PureClarity BMZ not have any content to display.

parameter.name: pc_bmz_display_mode
parameter.label: BMZ Display Mode
parameter.description: Select the display mode for the BMZ. Display mode settings are controlled using responsive style classes to decide when to show based on the page width.

parameter.name: pc_bmz_buffer
parameter.label: Apply margin
parameter.description: Apply a margin to the top and bottom of the BMZ.

parameter.name: pc_bmz_classes
parameter.label: CSS Custom Classes
parameter.description: Type in a comma seperated list of additional CSS classes to add to the PureClarity BMZ
